templates.title: Task Organization
templates.content:
Please help me organize and prioritize my tasks for {{timeframe}}. Consider urgency, importance, and dependencies. My tasks are:

{{tasks}}

templates.title: Weekly Summary
templates.content:
Based on my productivity data, please provide a weekly summary focusing on:
- Completed tasks and achievements
- Time spent on different activities
- Areas for improvement
- Recommendations for next week

Data: {{productivity_data}}

templates.title: Goal Setting
templates.content:
Help me create SMART goals (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound) for {{area}}. My current situation is: {{current_situation}}

My desired outcome is: {{desired_outcome}}

templates.title: Meeting Preparation
templates.content:
Help me prepare for a {{meeting_type}} meeting about {{topic}} scheduled for {{date}}. 

Attendees: {{attendees}}
Objectives: {{objectives}}

Please suggest:
1. Agenda items
2. Key questions to ask
3. Materials to prepare
4. Follow-up actions
